tool_description: Extracts frames from video files at specified intervals or timestamps for content analysis.

extraction_method.description: Method for frame extraction: interval, timestamps, uniform, or keyframes

interval_seconds.description: Interval between extracted frames in seconds (for interval method)

timestamps.description: Specific timestamps to extract frames (for timestamps method)

max_frames.description: Maximum number of frames to extract (1-1000)

output_format.description: Output format for frames: jpg or png

error_messages: Invalid extraction method: Use one of [interval, timestamps, uniform, keyframes].
Invalid interval: interval_seconds must be greater than 0.
Invalid timestamps: All timestamps must be non-negative and within video duration.
Max frames exceeded: max_frames must be between 1 and 1000.
Frame extraction failed: Could not extract frames from the video file.
usage: Provide video_path and extraction_method. Configure extraction parameters based on the chosen method.

extracted_frames.description: Paths to extracted frame image files

frame_timestamps.description: Timestamps of extracted frames in seconds

total_frames_extracted.description: Total number of frames successfully extracted
